content:
A single knowledge base for war veterans and their families has been created and operates to unify educational services on the E-veteran web platform.

About thisinformsGovernment portal.

Thee -teranYou can find urgent questions about services with:

  • professional adaptation,
  • preparation,
  • retraining,
  • Certification training,
  • Employment.

“You can also find out what are the guarantees and benefits for combatants, persons with disabilities, their families to provide professional adaptation services, full or partial payment for education at the expense of state and local budget retraining, advanced training), grants for the creation or development of a veteran business, etc. », - the message reads.

ArmyinformReminds what UBD benefits are provided and how to get them.
